
comment

//source code
contract Create2AndExtCodeHash {

  address public raddr;
  bytes32 public rhash;

  function deploy() public  {
    address addr;
    bytes32 h;
    assembly {
      addr := create2(0, 0x00, 0, 0x00)
      h := extcodehash(addr)
    }
    raddr = addr;
    rhash = h;
  }

  function getHash() public returns (bytes32) {
    bytes32 h;
    address addr = raddr;
    assembly {
      h := extcodehash(addr)
    }
    rhash = h;
    return h;
  }
}

end
account_new acc1 10000000000

# Deploy Contract

transaction_build tx01
    sender acc1
    receiverAddress 00
    value 0
    data 
    gas 1000000
    build

block_build b01
    parent g00
    transactions tx01
    build

block_connect b01
assert_best b01

# invoke deploy method

transaction_build tx02
    sender acc1
    nonce 1
    contract tx01   # created in tx01
    value 0
    data 775c300c
    gas 1000000000
    build

block_build b02
    parent b01
    transactions tx02
    gasLimit 3000000000
    build

block_connect b02
assert_best b02

# repeat until reaching activation block


transaction_build tx03
    sender acc1
    nonce 2
    receiverAddress 00
    value 0
    data 
    gas 1000000
    build

block_build b03
    parent b02
    transactions tx03
    build

block_connect b03
assert_best b03

# empty block just to get to the activation
block_build b04
    parent b03
    build

block_connect b04
assert_best b04


transaction_build tx04
    sender acc1
    nonce 3
    contract tx03   # created in tx01
    value 0
    data 775c300c
    gas 1000000000
    build

block_build b05
    parent b04
    transactions tx04
    gasLimit 3000000000
    build

block_connect b05
assert_best b05
assert_tx_success tx01
assert_tx_success tx02
assert_tx_success tx03
assert_tx_success tx04
